file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.3"
info:
  title: Recursive refs example
  version: "1.0"
paths:
  /foo:
    $ref: ./paths/foo.yml
components:
  schemas:
    Foo:
      $ref: ./components/Foo.yml
    Foo2:
      $ref: ./components/Foo/Foo2.yml
    Bar:
      $ref: ./components/Bar.yml
    Cat:
      $ref: ./components/Cat.yml
